CustomField.formula: IF( Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Standard' && ISBLANK(Partner__c) , Account.Name , IF( Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Reseller', Parent_Opp_Account_Name__c , IF(Opportunity_Record_Type_V2__c = 'Standard' && NOT(ISBLANK(Partner__c)) , Account.Name , NULL) ) )
CustomField.label: End Customer
